layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (50,50) size 700x154
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (50,50) size 700x154 [border: (1px solid #000000)]
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (51,51) size 598x52 [color=#000080] [border: (1px solid #000080)]
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (1,17) size 596x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 351x18
          text run at (0,0) width 351: "There should be a yellow square in the top-left corner, "
        LayoutInline {em} at (0,0) size 40x18
          LayoutText {#text} at (350,0) size 40x18
            text run at (350,0) width 40: "inside"
        LayoutText {#text} at (389,0) size 110x18
          text run at (389,0) width 110: " the inner border."
